column4: aaahhhhh i seee :D ok now im picking up what you guys throwing down
with regard to LTS, normal releases are supported for 3 years, LTS versions are supported for 5 years. or am i mistaken? im sure i read that somewhere
ok nevermind. 3years is right. 5years is for server editions.
Regular support is 18 months, LTS Desktop is 3 years.  See:  https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LTS
